description: PRAGATI: PM Modi reviews the progress towards handling and resolution of grievances related to school education and literacy PRAGATI: Overall Aadhar enrolment now close to 105 crore, special attentio
caption: nm-4.com
message:
At the Pragati session today, reviewed progress of handling and resolution of grievances related to school education. 

Urged officials to systematize the measures to address grievances of students & ensure they do not face any difficulty. Discussed Aadhaar related matters. Glad that in Aadhaar enrolment, special attention is being given to Northeast. http://nm-4.com/er7u
